entry.title: WINTER STORM WARNING, Fort Frances
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:03 p.m. EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 8. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming east 20 km/h late this evening. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 7 this evening and minus 14 overnight. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Periods of snow. High minus 2.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning early in the afternoon. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light early in the morning. Wind becoming east 30 gusting to 50 in the morning. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 6:46 PM EDT Monday 3 April 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
